Name: The Joanna
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of small lavender sprigs pegged to rim.
Review: Reminiscent of a vodkatini with fino sherry and notes of floral elderflower and lavender.
History: Created in 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Joanna contains 182 calories
